description: Subscription targets enables one to access the data to which you have subscribed in your projects.

SubscriptionTargetForm.description: The details of the subscription target configuration.

FormName.description: The form name included in the subscription target configuration.
FormName.markdownDescription:
The form name included in the subscription target configuration.

Type: String
